name: Bean Vader's (Alpha)
description:
This is my first game for the score space jam 

shoot randomly spawning beans with A.I and stop the from taking you can of beans!

one thing I forgot to mention in the controls is that you can use the scroll wheel to switch from a Glock, a sniper, and a ak

I made all the assets by my self with blender and unity and some 8 bit sound maker i found online
